title: Robert Irwin, Steve Irwin's Son, Stole Hearts On 'The Tonight Show' (WATCH) | Alex | Y93
text:
Robert Irwin, Steve Irwin's Son, Stole Hearts On 'The Tonight Show' (WATCH) posted by Alex Gervasi - Posted by The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon on Friday, February 17, 2017 
Almost 11 years ago, we a true animal lover and man who would just make you smile by his enthusiasm- Steve Irwin. 
His son, Robert, was only 2 at the time. Now, he is 13 and following in his father's footsteps. 
You have got to see him talk about these animals. His smile is infectious. Tweets by @AlexontheMic What's up? I'm Alex! So I guess I'll tell you a little bit about myself. I grew up in South Jersey (10 minutes from Philly) and went to school a few minutes from Lexington, Kentucky. Growing up I always wanted to be on the air. What's better than talking about and listening to music for a living? Sounds like a pretty good job to me. I'm here to to provide some good music for your ears and keep you informed on all the latest things happening around here. Sound good? Follow me on Twitter/Instagram: @alexonthemic Contact
